text: Life is not what happens to you,but it's always what you make out of it <3

text:
Having a shitty day :(
Send love <3

author: Sanudi Gunawardena
text:
I will never understand how #moms wake up early morning and start doing chores like morning fatigue never exists..
#Legendary!!

author: Sanudi Gunawardena
text: I'm a very complicated human..

author: Sanudi Gunawardena
text: Looking back at 3-4 years of bitter things I went through to get to where I am today, I'm forever grateful for that gut!

author: Sanudi Gunawardena
text:
Lunatic me wants to have a baby with a handpicked super genius (AKA father) & nurture the child in a continuously conditioned environment to create the replica of the version of super human I have in mind... 
I can't help myself at this point.

author: Sanudi Gunawardena
text:
Optimizing life 101 
Situation : "Being a night owl"

❌ Incorrect thinking - I just wake up late and I can't sleep, so I work! 

✅Correct thinking - I am ultra productive in zero distraction atmospheres AKA when everyone's alseep!

author: Sanudi Gunawardena
text:
Understanding the employee is even more consequential than understanding the customer. 
Argue?

author: Sanudi Gunawardena
text:
and, yes, even beggar-man and thief, regardless of his talents, penchants, tendencies, abilities, vocations, and race of his ancestors."
- John B. Watson's classic paper, "Psychology as the Behaviorist Views It"

author: Sanudi Gunawardena
text: "Give me a dozen healthy infants, well-formed, and my own specified world to bring them up in and I'll guarantee to take any one at random and train him to become any type of specialist I might select — doctor, lawyer, artist, merchant-chief...

author: Sanudi Gunawardena
text:
Just wondering how many businesses/jobs I might have to work on to afford the lifestyle I really aspire to live! 
#LOL

author: Sanudi Gunawardena
text: Quote of the century : "When men cheat it's below the belt, but when women cheat it's above the neck!"

author: Sanudi Gunawardena
text: Honestly! https://t.co/3TBotCs2BP

author: Sanudi Gunawardena
text:
One year ago I smoked a cigarette every early morning so it helped me to be "less anxious" when it came to work hurdles specifically. 

Glad to say I've improved. Not having 🚬 anymore but it really did help though...

author: Sanudi Gunawardena
text:
Came across a familiar term on my lecturer's presentation & my smartass literally spent few seconds trying to figure out where to press "ctrl+F" on my notebook to find where I've learnt this term before. ☠️

I haven't ever felt more stupider...

author: Sanudi Gunawardena
text:
"One day, whether you are 14, 28 or 65... you will stumble upon someone who will start a fire in you that cannot die.

However, the saddest, most awful truth you will ever come to find,

is they are not always with whom we spend our lives."

-copied-

author: Sanudi Gunawardena
text: If you have chemistry, then you only need one other thing.... Timing

author: Sanudi Gunawardena
text:
I'm so grateful that I trained myself to take shit as a learning curve. Whenever something happens it's always "good that I learnt...." 
Changed my life!

author: Sanudi Gunawardena
text: There's something about these sri lankan parents - They suddenly start caring about your well-being out of nowhere when you start going to university physically, untill it becomes too annoying and now you're pissed...🤦‍♀️

author: Sanudi Gunawardena
text: Are You Pursuing the WRONG Goals? (Intrinsic VS. Extrinsic Goals) https://t.co/i8icElIcJU

author: Sanudi Gunawardena
text:
Brace yourselves people, I just read something that blew my mind!🤯It goes as, "If all our needs aren’t being fully met, that’s when we start looking at things outside of ourselves to fulfill us."

The more I think about it and relate it to myself, the more true it is!!

author: Sanudi Gunawardena
text:
I learn things in the hardest way possible.
Life is traumatizing!

author: Sanudi Gunawardena
text:
It gets better, to be rich you need to work your way and get that money so you don't end up in jail or whatsoever & that money takes you to success and luxury. Take it or leave it - it's your choice..
So in end craving luxury isn't so bad at all huh?

author: Sanudi Gunawardena
text:
I just realized something crazy yet so true.
"Luxury" is a lifestyle, and the crazy part is that once you get a taste of it you crave it even more. Who doesn't want to be rich and to indulge in pure luxe? I do, and so do you!

author: Sanudi Gunawardena
text:
If you win,say nothing
If you lose, say less

author: Sanudi Gunawardena
text:
You call her a gold digger, but I call that keeping her standards high!
We're not the same bro...

author: Sanudi Gunawardena
text: You may be deceived if you trust too much, but you will live in torment if you don't trust enough...

author: Sanudi Gunawardena
text:
I had this flip of a switch moment today that completely made life alot more easier - Why do we always 'PEOPLE PLEASE' & let ourselves go through uncomfort whem we can just easily say "NO". No more BS bob the builder, I said what I said - NO!

Took me 22 years to realize :)

author: Sanudi Gunawardena
text: I can surely recreate the euphoria Sri Lankan version if my life ever become a series...

author: Sanudi Gunawardena
text:
Marketing automation is a very underrated topic! Can we maybe talk about it?👉👈  
#Marketing #automation

author: Sanudi Gunawardena
text: Find a place inside where there's joy, and the joy will bring out the pain...

author: Sanudi Gunawardena
text: People with above average intelligence either become crazy successful or crazy serial killers! No in between...

author: Sanudi Gunawardena
text:
She basically got out and tiptoed to the master bedroom and turned on the tv with cctv records and started checking. then slowly went on and woke my parents and got my dog (who's also upstairs lol) to go check downstairs with along with dad. 
Maan..my fat ass could never do this!

author: Sanudi Gunawardena
text:
I'm so frigging grateful for my 15 y/o sister!
It was 2 AM & we were sneaking food into the room while everyone else was asleep, suddenly we heard a noise downstairs. Well, I'd probably eat and sleep without giving a damn but my sis got up and chose "investigation" 🕵👣

author: Sanudi Gunawardena
text: I just realized that the career I've pursued so far and most known for is also exactly the one I've leasttt learnt in a formal educational environment. LOL

author: Sanudi Gunawardena
text: What happened in the past that was painful has a great deal to do with what we are today! <3

author: Sanudi Gunawardena
text:
I learnt a big lesson when I realized that I'm not supposed to react when closed-minded people disagreed with my ways of thinking...

They're not what I'm here to impress :)

author: Sanudi Gunawardena
text: Once you realize you deserve better, letting go will be the best decision ever.

author: Sanudi Gunawardena
text: Oh what a tangled web we weave when first we practice to deceive...

author: Sanudi Gunawardena
text: In life unlike chess, the game continues even after checkmate :)

author: Sanudi Gunawardena
text:
Me and my sister has a very symbiotic relationship.

She gives me her headphones to listen to music as mine is broken, I give her my phone to read wattpad as dad blocked wifi to her tablet. 

💀💀💀

author: Sanudi Gunawardena
text: Merry xxxmas people! 💀

author: Sanudi Gunawardena
text:
Monsters are real,
Ghosts are real,
They live inside us -  and sometimes they win :)

author: Sanudi Gunawardena
text: At this point I'm not even sure if there are people in this life journey who'd genuinely help me or stay with me with zero expectations 🤷‍♀️

author: Sanudi Gunawardena
text: You become #memorable in someone's #mind because you pinched their interests and let them talk a great deal about it - not because of anything else, trust me!
